summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Lighting Department, granting an easement for an access road over the City of Seattle Lighting Department's Skagit Transmission Line fee-owned right of way in the southwest quarter of Section 20, Township 31 North, Range 6 East, W.M. (Snohomish County) to Coastal Forest Products, Inc., and consenting to the continuation of the access road over the City's adjoining easement right of way.
